comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia on Arthur James Balfour, 1st Earl of Balfour, "British Conservative politician and statesman" who "served as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from July 1902 to December 1905, and was later Foreign Secretary in 1916–1919."

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: He authored the Balfour Declaration of 1917, supporting the establishment of a Jewish homeland in Palestine.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In May 1915, he became First Lord of the Admiralty, succeeding Winston Churchill.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for your research.  We'll add some of the information to the record the next time we update.
